languages.text: {n}Кость неприятно хрустит, а руку пронзает острая боль, но вам удается вправить вывих. Распухший локоть все еще выглядит скверно, но, по крайней мере, теперь вы можете двигать рукой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кость неприятно хрустит, а руку пронзает острая боль, но вам удается вправить вывих. Распухший локоть все еще выглядит скверно, но, по крайней мере, теперь вы можете двигать рукой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кость неприятно хрустит, а руку пронзает острая боль, но вам удается вправить вывих. Распухший локоть все еще выглядит скверно, но, по крайней мере, теперь вы можете двигать рукой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

{n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you still manage to set it. It would be a good idea to show it to the chirurgeon afterward, but at least you can move it now.{/n}
{n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

{n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hueso emite un crujido espantoso y sientes un dolor intenso en el brazo, pero logras que tu codo vuelva a su sitio. Sigue inflamado y el aspecto es preocupante, pero por lo menos puedes volver a moverlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hueso emite un crujido espantoso y sientes un dolor intenso en el brazo, pero logras que tu codo vuelva a su sitio. Sigue inflamado y el aspecto es preocupante, pero por lo menos puedes volver a moverlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}骨は嫌な音を立て、鋭い痛みが腕に走るが、なんとか肘を入れなおすことができた。腫れていて、まだ気がかりはあるが、少なくとも今は腕を動かすことはできる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}骨は嫌な音を立て、鋭い痛みが腕に走るが、なんとか肘を入れなおすことができた。腫れていて、まだ気がかりはあるが、少なくとも今は腕を動かすことはできる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}骨头发出了刺耳的咯吱声，一阵剧痛刺穿了你的手臂，但你还是将脱臼的关节复位了。你的胳膊肿得厉害，状况依然很让人担忧，但至少它可以动了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}骨头发出了刺耳的咯吱声，一阵剧痛刺穿了你的手臂，但你还是将脱臼的关节复位了。你的胳膊肿得厉害，状况依然很让人担忧，但至少它可以动了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Knochen knirscht unschön, und ein stechender Schmerz fährt dir in den Arm. Es gelingt dir aber, den Ellbogen wieder einzurenken. Er ist geschwollen und sieht nicht gut aus, aber immerhin kannst du deinen Arm jetzt bewegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Knochen knirscht unschön, und ein stechender Schmerz fährt dir in den Arm. Es gelingt dir aber, den Ellbogen wieder einzurenken. Er ist geschwollen und sieht nicht gut aus, aber immerhin kannst du deinen Arm jetzt bewegen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous parvenez à remettre l'os en place avec un craquement sonore, essayant tant bien que mal d'ignorer la douleur lancinante qui vous transperce le bras. Si vos chairs tuméfiées présentent un aspect inquiétant, au moins, vous pouvez de nouveau bouger le bras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous parvenez à remettre l'os en place avec un craquement sonore, essayant tant bien que mal d'ignorer la douleur lancinante qui vous transperce le bras. Si vos chairs tuméfiées présentent un aspect inquiétant, au moins, vous pouvez de nouveau bouger le bras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kemikten nahoş bir çıtırtı geliyor ve kolunda keskin bir acı hissediyorsun ama dirseğin yerine oturuyor. Şişmiş ve endişe verici görünse de artık kolunu oynatabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm, but you manage to reset the elbow. It has swollen and still looks worrisome, but at least you can move your arm now.{/n}
